about_the_game:
RocketJumpCascade is an adventure platformer game that will put your movement skills to the test. Embark on an exciting adventure as you explore intricate rifts to uncover new areas and attempt to beat your best times. With fast-paced and fluid gameplay, RocketJumpCascade offers a unique and challenging experience.

Your goal is to master the RocketJump, and find the quickest path through each level, unlocking new paths and secrets as you progress. You will have to use your reflexes, precision and creativity to discover optimal routes, and master your abilities to jump, blast and surf to beat your best time and reach the top of the leaderboard.

The game features a variety of environments and obstacles, each one more challenging than the last. But don't worry, as you improve, new powers, mechanics and items will be unlocked, making the gameplay more and more fun.

RocketJumpCascade is not just a game, it's a true movement and adventure experience, that will test your skill and keep you entertained for hours. Join the game and start your own journey!

-Fluid and responsive movement mechanics that focus on rocket jumping and other advanced techniques
-Fast-paced gameplay that will put your reflexes and precision to the test
-Power-ups and new areas that can be unlocked as you progress, adding new layers of depth to the gameplay

name: RocketJump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 Bit Only, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.7 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is an early prototype that is constantly in development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD RX 480 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is an early prototype that is constantly in development

short_description: Rocket Jump Cascade is a fps platformer where you use your rocket launcher to jump your way through mysterious hubs
